attributes.action: Route the cortege of our fallen heroes through Carterton or Bampton to allow the people to show their respects.
attributes.additional_details: There is no reason for the government to prevent the corteges from Brize Norton travelling through Carterton or Bampton other than the fact they want to hide the true cost of their conflicts. Why should our fallen heroes be denied the opportunity to have their sacrifice recognised by their relatives and the public.
